name: Sonic the Hedgehog Sucks Cock & Balls for Rings to Buy Chili Dogs & Knuckles
name_original: Sonic the Hedgehog Sucks Cock & Balls for Rings to Buy Chili Dogs & Knuckles
description:
You are Sonic, hedgehog marine. You want chili dogs but have no money, so you must suck greasy cock and balls to get chili dogs.

This short game takes place in the Kool Rat universe, and was made in a day for fun. See the main project that this spin-off was taken from here.
